Odoo ERP machine is an agency aid planning software program used company-wide for the administration of commercial enterprise processes. Moreover, it is a dependable and affordable device that can serve as a user’s complementary tool. In addition, the app lets clients contain third-party units with the superior software program to function the enterprise in their very own way.

Our SAP Services

Odoo Implementation

Odoo implementation services globally with a team of expert functional and technical resources who have more than 15 years of multiple industries’ experience to digitize their business process.

Odoo Customizations

Our expert Python developers have developed multiple add-ons and customizations for Odoo. We develop add-ons as per industry and business requirements to take full advantage of ERP.

Odoo Integrations

We provide Odoo integrations with other systems using APIs that enable Odoo to send or receive data to external systems. We have successfully done Odoo integrations with different payment gateways, social media platforms, eCommerce, and shipping systems..

odoo Support Services

We provide Odoo support Services remotely and onsite. Our Expert professional of different dimensions has the ability to support the entire Business ERP so you do not need to hire an in-house Team. To support your Entire Business ERP.

Is Odoo ERP suitable for large organizations?

Odoo ERP software arrangement is best for large organizations with a particular interest in an engaged region that likewise needs an elevated degree of individualization.

The Versions

Effective Cost Factor

No vendor's lock-in

Odoo ERP software does not offer the vendor’s lock-in function.

Odoo Versions and Editions

The new version of Odoo ERP is launched after every 12 months to ensure its functionality and its performance in its particular field. There are special types of Odoo ERP that should be understood for Odoo implementation and development. Few Odoo Editions are:

Odoo Community Edition:

The Odoo Community is free of price and you can start implementing Odoo on your server for free.

Odoo Enterprise Edition:

Odoo Enterprise Edition is a paid model that offers you top-quality corporation overall performance and software. Within the Community Edition of Odoo, these factors are now no longer available.

Online Odoo:

It is easy, to commence with, Odoo Online Enterprise Edition with your ERP software, it is online and managed with the resource of Odoo. Small corporations that opt to use ERP software program packages barring any custom-made introduction are targeted.

Odoo. sh

In order to understand Odoo.sh Version, you want to each have technical data in order to set up Odoo Enterprise Edition. This can be done with the help of companies all over the world. In addition, with Odoo.sh, you can moreover use a personalized module.

On-Premise Odoo:

You can take additional items of your Odoo ERP with Odoo On-reason and execute them and gather them on your confidential server as a trade for depending on Odoo for the server, you can besides design the on-premise Odoo processing gadget as per your business organization prerequisites.
